name: The NYPD Shaman
description:
In a secret backroom at NYPD HQ sits The Shaman.

The Shaman can seek out the most deceptive criminals in the city using the powers of the mind. He taps into criminals and shares their senses.

Initially, he can help you track down criminals by hinting at what they can smell and hear. As the chase progresses and you close in, The Shaman will also give directional information, and then finally a vision of the surrounding map area to help you capture the criminals once and for all!

Controls: Arrows keys to drive the cop car, Z to cycle the intro screen, X to play.

And endless game made for Ludum Dare 48, from scratch, in 48 hours, using Pico8.
